name: Breakout 2022
description:
This game was inspired by the game "Breakout" published by Atari on May 13, 1976. 

Controls:

"A" to go to the left

"D" to go to the right

Attributions:

Background Image Link: Cloud Wallpaper and Background Image | 1600x1200 (alphacoders.com)

Music was made by me using FL Studios.

SFX were made by me using Audacity.

Designs were made by me using Photoshop and Illustrator.

This game was made on Unity.
